amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the President or his designee from transferring or consolidating any functions, responsibilities, programs, staff or resources of the Office of Personnel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit the President or his designee from transferring or consolidating any functions, responsibilities, programs, staff or resources of the Office of Personnel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 182 (Roll no. 443).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 182 (Roll no. 443).
